Cellulose
An elixir-based framework for embedded systems

Cellulose - Documentation

The documentation is a work in progress...

Hub

Implements a gen_server that holds a heirarchial key-value store with publish/subscribe semanitcs at each node of the heirarchy.

Jrtp Bridge

JSON/REST Transport Protocol - plugin for cowboy

Ethernet

Ethernet support module for embedded systems

Discovery

Utilities for device and service discovery

Persistent Storage

Perisistently store erlang terms to the filesystem

Resources

A simple Elixir module to gather system resource information

Leds

Elixir module to easily control LEDs on linux

Logger Multicast Backend

Backend for Elixir.Logger to view logs over multicast UDP

Cell Tool

A simple command line interface for managing cells
